entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:12 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -32.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 12:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -32.4°C
Pressure: 103.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Dewpoint: -35.6°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 41 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
